column1: #text=I started using my local library after I canceled cable .
#text=It turns out that they have thousands of dvd 's and blue ray movies available for free .
#text=I live in a pretty decent sized town , so the library is actually really nice .
#text=One day my daughter and I were looking for movies .
#text=She told me about needing to download a book because she had seen a movie recently and wanted to read the book now .
#text=She was kind of shocked when I suggested that we look for the book at the library .
#text=She thought that people just used the computers there and borrowed movies .
#text=She did not think that they would have the book that she wanted .
#text=She thought that the only books there were encyclopedias and old books .
#text=She was really surprised when we were able to find the book that she had been wanting to download .
#text=Now , she would rather read a regular paper book than read a book on her tablet .
